Pick-up Arrow

Testing the ability to pick-up arrows.

Input Map:
|Start|Direction|End|
|1|East|Arrow(2)|
|Arrow(2)|East|3|
|3|South|Arrow(4)|

|Put user at 1|
|Check user has 3 arrows|

|Check that message appears saying "Pick-up arrow to reclaim it."|
|Press "p" key|
|Check that arrow count is 4|
|Go East|

|Check that message appears saying "Pick-up arrow to reclaim it."|
